Yoga: Yoga is an excellent way to stay active and fit, as it combines physical exercise with mental relaxation. You can find plenty of yoga poses and routines online that don't require any equipment.
Jumping and running: Jumping and running are great ways to get your heart rate up and stay active. You can also incorporate interval training, where you alternate between sprinting and jogging.

High-intensity interval training (HIIT): HIIT is a type of workout that involves short bursts of intense exercise followed by brief periods of rest. You can do HIIT with or without equipment, focusing on bodyweight exercises.
Walking or jogging: Walking or jogging is a simple and effective way to stay active and fit. You can start with short distances and gradually increase your distance as you get more comfortable.
Bodyweight strength training: You can do various bodyweight strength training exercises like push-ups, dips, and sit-ups to build muscle and stay fit.
